name: Frog Fu
description:
Welcome to Frog Fu!

You are a frog on a mission to escape from prison!

Use your tongue to punch through enemy hordes!

Can you make it all the way through the slime infested dungeon?

Instructions:
  • Move: WASD / ARROW KEYS / LEFT STICK
  • Attack: LEFT MOUSE BUTTON / SPACEBAR / A BUTTON

(partial controller support, will address in a future update)

Credits:

Chazi Martin: Audio, Dungeon Design

Justin Law: Programming, Gameplay Mechanics

Assets:

  • World of Solaria
  • Time Fantasy
  • Sunnyside
  • Kenney

Tools:

  • Unity Engine
  • LDtk
